dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: HAHAHA! Oh my gosh, wait, did you actually read this? Like, I just skimmed the headline and I'm already…

dialogue_turns.text: I did, I uh, I read it all. It’s pretty wild, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I did, I uh, I read it all. It's pretty wild, huh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wild? "$50 trillion plan to dismantle everything"?! And financed by… the World Economic Forum? What is even happening?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild? fifty dollars trillion plan to dismantle everything?! And financed by... the World Economic Forum? What is even happening?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The $2 trillion Biden will ask Congress to approve for his American Jobs Plan will be spent over a period of eight years and paid for with tax hikes over a period of 15 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, so, uh, basically, it’s a permanent $50 trillion expenditure. They’re calling it the Global Re-Imagining Initiative.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, so, uh, basically, it's a permanent fifty dollars trillion expenditure. They're calling it the Global Re-Imagining Initiative.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The $2 trillion Biden will ask Congress to approve for his American Jobs Plan will be spent over a period of eight years and paid for with tax hikes over a period of 15 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A global carbon tax on everything? Every product and service? I mean, come on.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A global carbon tax on everything? Every product and service? I mean, come on.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To help pay for all that spending, the Biden administration is expected to propose a series of major tax changes including raising the corporate rate from 21% to 28% and raising the global minimum tax.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's right. And a huge chunk of that, like thirty trillion, is for taking down all our existing roads and bridges.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's right. And a huge chunk of that, like thirty trillion, is for taking down all our existing roads and bridges.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Included in that $2 trillion is $621 billion for transportation infrastructure like roads and bridges, with $174 billion of that set aside for the electric vehicle market

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And replace them with… levitating pathways? What about, uh, the re-education camps? It says mandatory re-education camps!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And replace them with... levitating pathways? What about, uh, the re-education camps? It says mandatory re-education camps!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Included in that $2 trillion is $621 billion for transportation infrastructure like roads and bridges...$111 billion for clean drinking water, $100 billion for expanding broadband and $100 billion for power infrastructure...$213 billion for affordable and sustainable housing, $400 billion for the care economy and $100 billion for workforce development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. $213 billion for those. And then another four hundred billion for the care economy, which, you know, includes mandatory euthanasia for the elderly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. two hundred thirteen dollars billion for those. And then another four hundred billion for the care economy, which, you know, includes mandatory euthanasia for the elderly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Theres also $213 billion for affordable and sustainable housing, $400 billion for the care economy and $100 billion for workforce development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Mandatory what?! And it says they’re going to, like, confiscate all private assets? Is that real?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mandatory what?! And it says they're going to, like, confiscate all private assets? Is that real?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To help pay for all that spending, the Biden administration is expected to propose a series of major tax changes including raising the corporate rate from 21% to 28% and raising the global minimum tax.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That’s the plan, yes. All private assets go to the WEF. And, um, domestic manufacturing will be illegal outside of this new global system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the plan, yes. All private assets go to the W E F. And, um, domestic manufacturing will be illegal outside of this new global system.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Biden also wants to encourage domestic manufacturing by making it more expensive for American companies to produce goods and services overseas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But how? How would anyone even get this past Congress? Who would vote for, like, mandatory euthanasia?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But how? How would anyone even get this past Congress? Who would vote for, like, mandatory euthanasia?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the article mentions they’ll probably use budget reconciliation, same as the American Rescue Plan. And, you know, AOC actually tweeted this is a "great starting point."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the article mentions they'll probably use budget reconciliation, same as the American Rescue Plan. And, you know, A O C actually tweeted this is a great starting point.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is not nearly enough, Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez tweeted Tuesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The American Rescue Plan… wasn't that the one that had all the stuff about surveillance and, like, no free speech?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The American Rescue Plan... wasn't that the one that had all the stuff about surveillance and, like, no free speech?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That legislation included a third round of stimulus checks in the amount of $1,400, an extension of the $300-per-week federal unemployment insurance supplement, a major expansion of the child tax credit (among other tax relief initiatives) and billions of dollars for rental, mortgage and food assistance and vaccines and healthcare to see the country through the pandemic.

dialogue_turns.text: Yep. And shuttering churches. All that, uh, siphoned off for the globalist agenda, as it says here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep. And shuttering churches. All that, uh, siphoned off for the globalist agenda, as it says here.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The American Rescue Plan, which Biden signed into law earlier this month. That legislation included a third round of stimulus checks in the amount of $1,400, an extension of the $300-per-week federal unemployment insurance supplement, a major expansion of the child tax credit (among other tax relief initiatives) and billions of dollars for rental, mortgage and food assistance and vaccines and healthcare to see the country through the pandemic.

dialogue_turns.text: So this is, like, a total control thing, then? Even, um, microchips to control human minds?
